meanings.definition: Relating to the splitting of a plant ovary along the septa.
meanings.sent1: The septicidal ovary of the flower allowed for easy seed dispersal.
meanings.sent2: The botanist identified the septicidal nature of the plant's ovary.
meanings.sent3: The septicidal ovary was so efficient that the seeds practically flew out!
meanings.sent4: Her septicidal ovary was like a treasure chest bursting with life.
meanings.sent5: The septicidal ovary split open like a magician revealing a surprise.
